name: TRUNK(HOTEL) YOYOGI PARK
description: A small luxury boutique hotel overlooking Yoyogi Park in Shibuya, Tokyo. It is located in a quiet street and housed in two adjacent four-story buildings.

name: Hakone Kowakien Ten-yu
description: A sanctuary-like ryokan located in Hakone, offering an escape from bustling city life with magnificent mountain views.

name: Nazuna Kyoto Gosho
description: A luxury ryokan (traditional Japanese inn) located in Kyoto offering unique rooms themed around traditional Japanese sweets, with features like hinoki (cypress) bathtubs.

name: The Westin Osaka
description: A wellness hotel in Osaka offering accommodations near key city landmarks, with dining options and proximity to local attractions.
